oils.name: Lavender
oils.common_applications: Apply to temples, wrists, and bottom of feet. Diffuse before sleep or during meditation.

oils.name: Peppermint
oils.common_applications: Apply to neck and temples for focus. Inhale directly for alertness. Add to water for digestive support.

oils.name: Frankincense
oils.common_applications: Apply to wrists and heart center. Diffuse during meditation or prayer.

oils.name: Wild Orange
oils.common_applications: Diffuse to uplift mood. Apply to pulse points. Add to water for refreshing drink.

oils.name: Tea Tree (Melaleuca)
oils.common_applications: Apply to skin for purification. Diffuse to cleanse air and energy.

oils.name: Lemon
oils.common_applications: Add to water for detox support. Diffuse for mental clarity. Apply to chest for uplifting energy.

oils.name: Deep Blue (Soothing Blend)
oils.common_applications: Massage into muscles and joints after activity or for comfort.

oils.name: Balance (Grounding Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply to bottom of feet morning and night. Inhale deeply for grounding.

oils.name: Serenity (Restful Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply to neck and wrists before bed. Diffuse in bedroom for restful sleep.

oils.name: Breathe (Respiratory Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply to chest and throat. Inhale deeply for respiratory support.

oils.name: On Guard (Protective Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply to bottom of feet daily. Diffuse to protect environment. Take internally for immune support.

oils.name: Elevation (Joyful Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply over heart and to pulse points. Inhale for instant mood boost.

oils.name: Bergamot
oils.common_applications: Apply to heart center and solar plexus. Diffuse to promote self-acceptance.

oils.name: Ylang Ylang
oils.common_applications: Apply to wrists and behind ears. Diffuse to promote self-love and release tension.

oils.name: Eucalyptus
oils.common_applications: Apply to chest for respiratory support. Diffuse for mental clarity and fresh energy.

oils.name: Cedarwood
oils.common_applications: Apply to bottom of feet for grounding. Diffuse during yoga or meditation.

oils.name: Rose
oils.common_applications: Apply over heart center. Inhale for emotional healing and self-love.

oils.name: Clary Sage
oils.common_applications: Apply to pulse points and abdomen. Diffuse for clarity and hormonal support.

oils.name: Vetiver
oils.common_applications: Apply to bottom of feet and back of neck. Diffuse for grounding and focus.

oils.name: Geranium
oils.common_applications: Apply to wrists and over liver area. Diffuse for emotional balance.

oils.name: Sandalwood
oils.common_applications: Apply to third eye and crown. Diffuse during meditation for spiritual connection.

oils.name: Grapefruit
oils.common_applications: Apply to areas of concern. Add to water. Diffuse to uplift and inspire gratitude.

oils.name: Cypress
oils.common_applications: Apply to chest during times of transition. Diffuse to support emotional flow.

oils.name: Patchouli
oils.common_applications: Apply to lower abdomen and feet. Diffuse for grounding and confidence.

oils.name: Myrrh
oils.common_applications: Apply over heart and womb area. Diffuse for spiritual healing and protection.

oils.name: Copaiba
oils.common_applications: Apply to pulse points for calm. Take internally for overall wellness support.

oils.name: Adaptiv (Calming Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply to wrists and neck during stressful times. Inhale to promote adaptability.

oils.name: Motivate (Encouraging Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply to pulse points in morning. Inhale before important tasks for courage.

oils.name: Forgive (Renewing Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply over heart. Inhale during meditation to support forgiveness and release.

oils.name: Console (Comforting Blend)
oils.common_applications: Apply over heart during times of loss. Inhale for emotional comfort and healing.
